Name: [Shield] Tactical Rucksack
Desc: Shielded Agents deal <color=#2BAD00>35%</color> more DMG and won't take DMG <color=#2BAD00>that exceeds their Shield</color>. This effect can trigger once every 12s.
Desc2:
A large capacity and extra compartments are all you need to carry supplies for a whole squad...
As long as you're willing to shoulder the load.
